topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556cddb16368720ccd3e0500#post_556cddb16368720ccd3e0500
Yeah. Not all of us have the appetite to shove down food early in the morning when we are just barely awake. I feel puking every time I have to shove breakfast down to beat he schedule. Totally unhealthy.

Why must society go with three meals a day at fixed times? I eat as much as I want and whenever I want.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
First off though: Lucky Star ep22 impressions

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]WHAT IS UP WITH YOUR NOSE

United States vs Japan baseball... is that a thing?

ROLLER IS LOVE. ROLLER IS LIFE. sorry that's Splatoon talking

i still do the straw thing >_>

"bread factory" i dun get it

dangit Konata's mother was brought up, now the mood feels weird

and... now it is weird, her ghost wandered into the house with them

that was an oddly heartfelt scene... heck i liked it though :3

lucky channel segment 10/1

nice character interaction at the end[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

so this episode got me to feel a bit, so it has that going for itself, which is nice
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200
